title: Higher Sales Across Divisions Lift Johnson & Johnson as Healthcare Sector Recovers
sub_head: Company’s revenue rose 11% year over year in third quarter to $23.34 billion
body:
Johnson & Johnson ’s sales climbed in the latest quarter compared with the same stretch of last year, reflecting a return of more doctor’s visits and medical procedures after the pandemic disrupted the industry.
The company’s revenue rose 11% year over year in the third quarter to $23.34 billion. Its results are closely watched in the healthcare sector because its products span multiple categories.
